profile.description: Varios años de experiencia en desarrollo de aplicaciones web, sector en el que me gustaría seguir con mi carrera profesional. Tengo un perfil más frontend, que es donde me gustaría seguir especializándome, pero a la hora de ejecutar proyectos participo en todas las áreas del ciclo de vida de estos: preventa, backlog, delivery, devops, desarrollo (front, back, bbdd), gestión de equipo, proyecto, ... Me gusta cuidar mucho el detalle y usabilidad de las aplicaciones web en las que trabajo. Foco en la calidad y buenas prácticas. En los últimos 2 años he estado liderando como Engineering Manager un equipo de varias personas con varios proyectos, apoyando al equipo a crecer, así como a tomar decisiones técnicas y mantener las buenas prácticas que hemos definido como equipo.

challenges.description: Develop web and mobile applications for several clients with agile methodologies, putting focus on delivering value to customer with quality, using following technologies: CSS, HMTL, angular, typescript, javascript, node, .net, react, vue, sass, ionic, cordova, capacitor, sql server, azure Main responsibilities: * Help external dev teams to bootstrap applications with scalable architectures and good practices. * Train external dev teams: angular, CSS, HTML, typescript. * Develop CI/CD pipelines. * Create design systems. * Help colleagues and new incorporations to keep good practices and internal culture. * Project management. * Participate in selling processes and offers. * Consultancy.

Contract in the technological startup Upplication S.L., dedicated to the development of an online tool which will allow companies and commerces develop easily their low-cost webapps / native apps: * Development of the responsive web application built with AngularJS, HTML5, LESS, Bootstrap, Phonegap,... * Development of an API REST built in NodeJs against MongoDB.

Contract as Analyst Programmer at the IT Company Virtual Software S.L., mainly dedicated to the development of web applications for the insurance sector (Web Portal for the insurance company Caser, to contract agricultural insurances; Customer Care Portal of Liberty Seguros and Caser, Internal Management Portal and Intranet Portal of UNESPA,...) responsible for various roles and functions: * Functional Analysis of Web Applications and Batch Processes. * Design, planning, maintenance, documentation and testing of these applications. * Management of a software development team (1-3 members). * Development of Web Applications in J2EE, Desktop Applications in Java Swing and Batch Processes in Java. * Maintenance and tunning of JBoss, Weblogic and Apache Tomcat servers.
